# status

**Instance Property**

The status code for the authorization result.

## Declaration

```swift
required short status;
```

## Discussion

For status values, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/apple-pay-status-codes].

## Providing authorization results

- **errors**: A list of custom errors to display on the payment sheet.
